A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly written. Character development of Luke is flimsy and undeserved. Leia scene (you know which) is utterly ridiculous. Not a single lightsaber on lightsaber clash. Not once does a lightsaber touch another. Snoke is dumb. They picked the dumbest possible way to handle him. Movie is forgettable and can be explained in about 30 seconds to someone if they were to skip it. The end of the movie has made next to no progress over the beginning. Vile excuse for a star wars film.
